content:
I know that Zulip has awesome customized fields for profiles, but I don't know the way those fields could be searchable.
For example in Slack you can search on titles of people, is there such thing in Zulip? Is it planned?
It's not currently searchable but it'd be very doable in the "Settings > Users" table from an engineering standpoint. Most of the work would be figuring out how to do the search UI for it.
But who have access to Setting Users? Iâ€™m talking about the way to provide user search for all the people who can open another user profile
Everyone has access to that page, though only admins can make edits to user profiles from that page. Here's the link for the page here on CZO: https://chat.zulip.org/#organization/user-list-admin.
